content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?

content: The main topic of this conversation was the negotiation for the rental price of the apartment in Magdeburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] How much was the starting point for the rental price?
[Answer] The starting point for the rental price was 650 Euro per month.

[Question] What was the lowest price offered during the negotiation?
[Answer] The lowest price offered during the negotiation was 550 Euro per month.

[Question] What was the highest price offered during the negotiation?
[Answer] The highest price offered during the negotiation was 600 Euro per month.

[Question] Did you reach an agreement on the rental price?
[Answer] No, we did not reach an agreement on the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.

content:
[Question] Did you agree on a final price?
[Answer] No, we did not agree on a final price.

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.

content:

[Answer] I did not provide a rating for the likeability of the negotiation partner.

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".

content:

[Answer] No, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation.

content:
